thread.title: Crews Battle House Fire In Perryopolis
thread.title_full: Crews Battle House Fire In Perryopolis

author: hlang84
title: Crews Battle House Fire In Perryopolis
text:
PERRYOPOLIS (KDKA) — Crews are battling a house fire this evening in Fayette County.
The fire broke out around 6:45 p.m. in the 100 block of Barney Road in Perryopolis.
Emergency officials say no injuries have been reported.
There’s no word yet on what sparked the fire.
Stay with KDKA for the latest on this developing story.
